articles.title: DPRK Trade Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Trade Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government trade delegation led by Ku Pon Thae, vice minister of Foreign Trade, Wednesday left here to participate in the 9th China-Northeast Asia Exposition to be held in Changchun, China.

articles.title: Overseas Compatriots Arrive Here
articles.content:
Overseas Compatriots Arrive Here
						
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. led by Chairman Yun Kil Sang, the delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Canada headed by Kim Won Baek and the delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans led by Kim Georgi Wednesday arrived here to participate in celebrations of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Ri Chae Son, vice-chairperson of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, arrived here earlier.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Staff Members of Malaysian Embassy Here Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Staff Members of Malaysian Embassy Here Held
						
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting with staff members of the Malaysian embassy here took place at Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Wednesday on the national day of Malaysia.
					 Present there on invitation were Malaysian Charge d'affaires ai Ilham Tuah Bin Illias and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Present there were members of the DPRK-Malaysia Friendship Association and officials concerned.
					
					 Participants of the meeting talked to one another about the need to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Malaysia. They watched an art performance given by students of Ryusong Junior Secondary School in Central District.
					
					 On the same day they had sports and amusement games at the Pyongyang Gold Lane.

articles.title: National Symposium on Nation-building Exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Nation-building Exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Held 
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A national symposium took place Wednesday at the Central Youth Hall to deeply study and glorify the immortal nation-building exploits performed by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 65th founding anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials of the party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, media and revolutionary history and party-workers training bodies. 
					
					 The symposium heard papers which explained and proved the exploits of the Generalissimos who built a genuine government of the people in DPRK and turned the country into a socialist power where people enjoy happiness. 
					
					 Speakers said that since its foundation the DPRK has won victories only defending its sovereignty under the wise guidance of the Generalissimos. 
					
					 The DPRK is a genuine people's country serving the people and the most advantageous socialist state centered on the popular masses, they said, and went on:
					
					 65-year-long history of the DPRK is characterized by advance and victories under the Songun politics. 
					
					 The DPRK puts forward the building of a thriving socialist nation as the idea and general target of nation-building. It is dynamically advancing toward a final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 To faithfully uphold the leadership of Kim Jong Un is a sure guarantee for glorifying the immortal exploits of the Generalissimos in nation building. 
					
					 The speakers called upon the service personnel, people and all other party members to glorify long the revolutionary life and nation-building exploits of the Generalissimos and work hard for the successful accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving socialist nation, united close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opened to Mark Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opened to Mark Birthday of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition "65 years of victory and glory" was opened with due ceremony at the Grand People's Study House on Wednesday to celebrate the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition the 65-year-long history of socialist Korea where it opened a new history of change and made a leap forward toward prosperity under the leadership of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there is photos of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung appointed as premier of the Cabinet at the first session of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly," "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung and great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il inspecting a forefront post," "Anti-Japanese War Hero Comrade Kim Jong Suk casting a ballot at an election station" and "Supreme leader Comrade Kim Jong Un standing on the tribune of honor inaugurating the Kumsusan Palace of Sun, the supreme temple of Juche."
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, officials concerned and Pyongyangites.

articles.title: Women's Premier Soccer League Matches Close
articles.content:
Women's Premier Soccer League Matches Close
						
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Thrilling league matches among women's premier soccer teams which had started in the run-up to the 65th birthday of the DPRK came to a close. 
					 The last matches between Ri Myong Su and Kalmaegi teams belonging to Group C and between Pyongyang and Hwangryongsan teams belonging to Group D took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Wednesday. 
					
					 Ri Myong Su Team beat its rival 2:0 while Pyongyang Team trounced its rival 5:1. 
					
					 Semi-finals will be played by the teams which proved successful in each group from Sept. 6 to 8.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Pressing for Building Highly Civilized Socialist Country
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Pressing for Building Highly Civilized Socialist Country 
						
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday editorially calls upon all the people to turn out in the building of a highly civilized socialist country under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and glorify the country as a highly civilized and developed country, a thriving socialist nation of Juche looked up by the world.
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The highly civilized socialist country being built by the DPRK is the country where all the people enjoy a cultural life under socialism under the most civilized conditions and circumstances, being possessed of high cultural knowledge, strong body and attractive moral traits, and whose society is full of beautiful and sound life-style. 
					
					 It is the country in which the idea and desire of the people have come true and Juche character and national character are embodied and intrinsic demands of socialist society are fully met. 
					
					 The most advantageous socialist system and rich experience and foundation provided in the protracted historical struggle serve as the powerful driving force for building the highly civilized socialist country.
					
					 In Korean-style socialism which is centered on the popular masses the people have become the master of everything and everything of society serves them. In the DPRK all the activities of the party and the state are oriented to improving the people's living standard. The systems of universal free compulsory education and free medical care are enforced in the DPRK and literature and arts, sports and all other cultural fields serve the people to make them developed ones in all aspects being possessed of the consciousness of independence, high cultural knowledge, strong physical body and noble moral traits.
					
					 Through the long historical struggle to build a thriving nation the people of the DPRK have cultivated the spirit of valuing things their own and believing in their own strength and have gained rich experience of innovation and upsurge for strongly aspiring after  things new. In this course, the number of schools, hospitals, theatres and other cultural wealth significantly increased and strong material and technical foundations have been laid to achieve high civilization. 
					
					 The DPRK's cause of building a thriving nation is being actively pushed ahead as there are the people with strong revolutionary spirit, creativity, outstanding wisdom, talents and immense potentials.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Make Apology for Massacre of Koreans
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Make Apology for Massacre of Koreans 
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Solidarity of Citizens for Korean Victims of the 1923 Great Quake in Japan and other organizations of south Korea held a press conference at the "National Assembly" on Monday at which they demanded the Japanese government make a formal apology for the massacre of Koreans during the great Kanto quake in 1923.
					 The speakers recalled that the Japanese government proclaimed a martial law after the occurrence of the quake in Kanto in September 90 years ago and then spread wild rumors and hurled troops, police and "ultra-right organizations" into cruel massacre of Koreans. 
					
					 Much water has flown under the bridge since then, the Japanese government has not made any formal apology for the massacre of Koreans during the quake, they charged.
					
					 They stressed the need to disclose all the Japanese imperialists' mass killings of Koreans so that the tragedy of crime-woven history may not repeat itself.
					
					 Then a press release was read out.
					
					 It demanded the Japanese government make public all the official information on the massacre of Koreans during the quake which it has concealed so far and, at the same time, immediately stop the moves to distort the history textbooks.
					
					 It urged the present "government" to make an immediate probe into the massacre of Koreans committed by the Japanese imperialists.

articles.title: Suppression of Trade Union Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Trade Union Denounced in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Personages of civic and public organizations and the labor circle of south Korea held a meeting in front of Hyundai Motors in Ulsan on August 31 in protest against its suppression of trade union.
					 The speakers at the meeting recalled that Hyundai Motors' unreasonable treatment of the part-time workers and suppression of trade union resulted in suicide of a worker.
					
					 They vowed to intensify their actions to prevent many part-time workers from committing suicides.

articles.title: Puppet Group's Fabrication of Plot for Rebellion under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Group's Fabrication of Plot for Rebellion under Fire in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Committee of Measures against the Intelligence Service (IS)-Fabricated Plot for Rebellion and Suppression under the Pretext of Security made up of civic and social organizations of people from all walks of life in south Korea held a meeting in front of the IS's building on Aug. 31 in protest against its fabrication of the plot for rebellion.
					 At the meeting the committee recalled that the IS which had orchestrated such worst case in history as interfering in the past "presidential" election shamelessly fabricated the plot for rebellion this time.
					
					 The only evidence produced by it is the distorted record of the meeting held in last May but this made it clear that there was no plot for rebellion.
					
					 In the final analysis, it was fully disclosed that the plot for rebellion touted by the IS was nothing but an anti-people charade and a conspiratorial farce orchestrated by the IS and "government" to get rid of their predicament.
					
					 It called on the people to foil through candlelight actions and by the efforts of the people  the IS move to prop up power by cooking up the plot for rebellion, much upset by the people's towering resentment at its illegal interference in the election.
					
					 It urged the authorities to stop making much fuss about the anachronistic plot for rebellion and suppressing people under the pretext of security, release the detained personages and dismantle the IS, etc.

articles.title: Attempt to Arrest Opposition Party Member Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Attempt to Arrest Opposition Party Member Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- South Korean internet paper Voice of People carried an editorial "Is it the hunting of a witch following the north?" on Monday. 
					 The editorial said it is the judgment of the defense counsel side that it would be difficult to charge a lawmaker from the Unified Progressive Party with the crime of suspicious attempt at the rebellion. 
					
					 But the conservative media, which kept mum about the IS's interference in the election and the candlelight actions against it, widely reported unconfirmed data cooked up by the IS, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 What is more surprising is that they presented such absurd reasoning as "following the north" and "pro-north" behind the approval of arrest on charges of plotting rebellion. 
					
					 This shows that the typical witch-hunting campaign of those "following the north" is reoccurring. 
					
					 Sympathizing with the approval of arrest engineered by the IS and being pushed forward by the "Saenuri Party" is tantamount to becoming an accomplice with the historical crimes.

articles.title: Conservative Scholars' Distortion of History under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conservative Scholars' Distortion of History under Fire in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News Monday carried an editorial denouncing the puppet conservative forces for their distortion of history.
					 The editorial referred to the uproar made by political and academic, media circles and personages of other circles over the final screening of the history textbook for higher schools on August 30.
					
					 The compilation of this textbook was spearheaded by Neo-conservative scholars who termed the existing textbook "left-inclined." The new book says that the Japanese imperialists began enforcing sexual slavery from 1944, the closing period of their colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 In the final analysis, the book downplays and distorts the earlier assertion of the academic circles that the Japanese imperialists committed the crime in real earnest right after the proclamation of the "state ordinance for general mobilization" late in the 1930s.
					
					 Moreover, it refers at length to the fact that the "May 16 military coup" staged by Park Chung-Hee was allegedly supported by broad public at that time.
					
					 On the contrary, the book in the part dealing with the May 18 Kwangju popular uprising does not mention the indiscriminate killing of civilians by puppet troops, the core point of the uprising, but simply describes the fact that some of the demonstrators were equipped with arms and occupied the provincial office and there were many casualties in this course and so on. 
					
					 The book noted that there were more negative comments during the Kim Dae Jung and Roh Moo Hyun regimes than the Roh Tae Woo and Lee Myung Bak regimes. It went the lengths of referring to "the nuclear issue in the north" and "human rights issue in the north."
					
					 The editorial said all this was more biased than the controversial textbook in the early period of the Lee regime.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Slam S. Korean IS-fabricated Plot for Rebellion
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Slam S. Korean IS-fabricated Plot for Rebellion 
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held a meeting in New York on Aug. 30 to denounce the puppet Intelligence Service of south Korea for cooking up a plot for rebellion. 
					 The participants in the meeting watched a video showing the actions of south Korean people against the IS's interference in the election and its fabrication of the case. 
					
					 Speakers there held that the tight-cornered IS was repeating its several decades-old evil practices of cooking up false cases in a bid to prop up power. 
					
					 The chief executive should be responsible for the prevailing situation and step down, they demanded. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants staged a demonstration chanting slogans "Park Chung-Hee staged a military coup, Park Geun Hye perpetrated an election coup. The regime installed through a coup step down!" and "Dissolve IS which cooked up false rebellion case!", carrying placards reading "No new yusin dictatorship", "Dissolve IS which cooked up rebellion case and is suppressing progressive party", etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Supported by Bulgarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Supported by Bulgarian
						
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA)-- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, made public a statement on August 29 in support of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution".
					 The statement said that the talk reflects the firm will of the DPRK to meet all challenges and foil all the disturbing moves of imperialists and enemies of socialism and advance along the path of socialism with the Songun politics.
					
					 It expressed firm solidarity with the Korean people in their efforts to firmly defend the socialist cause by dint of Songun policy and build an economic power and achieve independent and peaceful reunification of the country at an early date.

articles.title: Ugandan Preparatory Committee to Mark DPRK Anniversary Formed
articles.content:
Ugandan Preparatory Committee to Mark DPRK Anniversary Formed
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- An Ugandan preparatory committee was inaugurated with due ceremony in Kampala on August 29 to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Henry Masiko, director of the Presidency, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize celebration meeting, photo exhibition and other various events on the occasion of September 9.
					
					 At the ceremony Kirunda Kivejinja, senior advisor to the president, said:
					
					 After the liberation of Korea President Kim Il Sung set forth the line on building party, state and army and made tireless efforts to build a democratic and independent sovereign state and thus founded the DPRK on September 9, 1948.
					
					 After its foundation the DPRK defeated the invasion of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to defend its sovereignty and successfully built socialism centered on the people.
					
					 At present the DPRK is making shining achievements in building a thriving nation, life-long desire of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KFA to Celebrate DPRK's 65th Birthday
articles.content:
KFA to Celebrate DPRK's 65th Birthday 
						
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Korean Friendship Association for celebrating the 65th founding anniversary of the DPRK was formed in Tarragona, Spain on Aug. 30. 
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the KFA, was elected the chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 It decided to hold an internet exhibition with works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and let representatives of the KFA in different countries hold celebration events on the occasion of the DPRK's birthday, September 9.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was held in Romania and Indonesia and a lecture and round table talks in the Czech Republic on August 24 and 26 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said that September 9 is a significant day when Kim Il Sung, great leader of the Korean people and eternal President of the DPRK, founded the DPRK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Korean people are holding in high esteem Kim Il Sung as eternal President of the DPRK and Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania warmly congratulates the Korean people on Sept. 9 and will always extend full support to them in their just struggle.
					
					 The deputy director and the head of administration department of Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia said that they came to know well on the occasion of Sept. 9 about the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung who founded the DPRK and led it to victory only.
					
					 They are convinced that the DPRK, which demonstrates its dignity and might to the world as it holds Marshal Kim Jong Un as supreme leader, would register greater success in building an economic power, too.
					
					 The chairman of the Usti Nad Labem County Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia affirmed that he would conduct brisk solidarity activities supporting the Korean people in their just cause.
					
					 The chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association highly praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for their exploits in nation building and Songun revolution, saying the Korean people would build a thriving nation and achieve national reunification in the near future, united close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on German Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on German Website 
						
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The German MS Traveling Agency on Aug. 30 posted on its website supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution".  The talk was carried in Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), the 53rd Day of Songun.
					 The talk deals with the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of leader Kim Jong Il and clarifies the essence and originality of the idea of the Songun revolution and the tasks to be carried out to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The website carried a photo of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un looking round the Amusement Park in Kaeson Youth Park.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad de defensa de isla Wolnae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad de defensa de isla Wolnae
						
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la unidad de defensa de la isla Wolnae que se reconstruye a las alturas de la epoca del Songun.
					El fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pak Jong Chon, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun.
					
					Ante todo, el Mariscal recorrio el campo de construccion del cuartel.
					
					Mirando de lejos y de cerca el cuartel construido ordenadamente, dio la indicacion de ajustar bien el colorido de las paredes exteriores de edificios para que estos parezcan elegantes y les gusten a los militares.
					
					Tras recorrer el edificio de la comandancia y la oficina del jefe de la unidad, nuevamente construidos, el Comandante Supremo estuvo en la sala de educacion donde pregunto la anchura, la longitud y la cantidad de asientos de ella.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de acondicionar mejor la sala conforme a los sentimientos y sentido de estetica de los uniformados para que ella cumpliera el papel de centro de educacion politica e ideologica.
					
					El Comandante Supremo recorrio el cuartel, el bano publico, etc.
					
					La reconstruccion de esta unidad es una labor muy importante para dar magnificas condiciones de vida a los militares, que dedican su juventud en este puesto isleno apartado, y fortalecer la linea avanzada de defensa de la patria como bastion inexpugnable, asevero.
					
					Tomo las medidas necesarias para terminar con exito la edificacion del cuartel.
					
					Acto seguido, el Mariscal estuvo en el reparto de viviendas.
					
					Mirando las viviendas levantadas en filas, apunto que cuando termine la obra, la isla Wolnae se transformara de modo irreconocible.
					
					Cuando paso por el bano publico, la peluqueria y la barberia del Centro de Servicios Publicos Wolnae, dijo complacido que se ha hecho bien la ejecucion de la obra y se usaron buenos materiales de acabado.
					
					Encomendo construir mejor el jardin de la infancia y la escuela acorde a la psicologia infantil y levantar con peculiaridad la cerca para que salte a la vista el reparto de viviendas.
					
					Subrayo la necesidad de sembrar mucho mas arboles para convertir la isla en area boscosa.
					
					Subio al puesto de vigilancia donde se cercioro de los ultimos movimientos de enemigos y recorrio las trincheras de fuego dando instrucciones preciosas para completar la disposicion ordinaria de combate segun la demanda de la guerra contemporanea.
					
					Se mostro satisfecho de que hayan modernizado el puesto de vigilancia y convertido todas las trincheras en bastion inexpugnable, de modo que la isla se convirtiera en un buque de guerra indestructible.
					
					El Comandante Supremo se fotografio junto a los militares de la unidad de defensa y sus familiares y abrazo a los ninos islenos dispensandoles gran amor.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Empresa de Maricultura de Ryongyon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Empresa de Maricultura de Ryongyon
						
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Empresa de Maricultura de Ryongyon.
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pak Jong Chon, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun.
					
					Primero, el Mariscal recorrio la lapida levantada en el recinto, que transmite la visita de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El Dirigente enseno criar en el mar esturiones y otros peces de agua dulce diciendo que algunos peces de agua dulce tienen el color vistoso y buen apetito si crecen en el mar, recordo el Mariscal y se entero del estado de materializacion de su instruccion.
					
					En la piscina no.1 bajo techo, pregunto de donde traen los esturiones pequenos y se cercioro del ciclo y cantidad de produccion y de las unidades a ser suministradas.
					
					Enviar al Restaurante Okryu el esturion de buen apetito y alta nutricion es el legado del Dirigente, asevero y anadio que la empresa debe cumplirlo cabalmente.
					
					El Mariscal vio la holoturia criada en la piscina al aire libre.
					
					Mostro gran satisfaccion al recibir el parte de que la empresa habia completado la investigacion sobre el metodo peculiar de cria de holoturia reduciendo a la mitad el ciclo de produccion en comparacion con otros paises.
					
					Tras concluir su recorrido por la empresa, el Mariscal dio instrucciones preciosas que sirven de guia programatica para mejorar e intensificar mas las actividades de operacion de la empresa.
					
					Es muy importante tanto la modernizacion de las piscinas y la investigacion sobre la cria de peces y el cultivo de plantas marinas como los esfuerzos por brindar beneficios reales al pueblo, recalco y acentuo la necesidad de fijar correctamente las unidades a ser suministradas a base de la cantidad de produccion, acondicionar bien en la ciudad de Pyongyang las bases de servicios publicos de productos maritimos, equipadas con comedores y tiendas y normalizar su operacion.
					
					Hay que criar muchos peces de alta calidad como esturiones y enviarlos al mercado internacional para resolver el problema de piensos hechos con harinas de pescado muy necesarios a la piscicultura y asegurar la ganancia en la gestion, acoto.
					
					Por ultimo se refirio a la necesidad de organizar en detalles la labor por sacar ganancia al elaborar bien las huevas de esturiones, reconocidas como alimento de alta calidad en escala mundial.

articles.title: Abierto simposio central sobre hazanas de Generalisimos por fundacion de la RPDC
articles.content:
Abierto simposio central sobre hazanas de Generalisimos por fundacion de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 4 en la capitalina Casa Central de la Juventud el simposio central de las inmortales hazanas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il realizadas por la fundacion del Estado.
					Asistieron a la ocasion el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion y de los organos de conservacion de reliquias historicas de la revolucion y de formacion de cuadros del partido.
					
					Fueron publicadas las disertaciones que explicaron y argumentaron las hazanas de los Generalisimos quienes establecieron en esta tierra el verdadero poder popular y convirtieron a la Republica en una potencia socialista donde vive felizmente el pueblo.
					
					Los seminaristas dijeron que desde la fundacion de la RPDC hasta hoy, se escribio la historia de victorias y se defendio la soberania del pais bajo la destacada direccion de los Generalisimos.
					
					Explicaron que la RPDC es el verdadero pais del pueblo en que lo todo sirve para este y un Estado socialista mas ventajoso centrado en las masas populares.
					
					Recordaron que los 65 anos de la RPDC son una trayectoria de avance victorioso bajo la bandera de Songun.
					
					La RPDC, que toma la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista como ideal y meta general de la construccion del Estado, marcha adelante hacia la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, resaltaron.
					
					Interpretaron que apoyar fielmente la direccion del Mariscal es la garantia decisiva para exaltar las imborrables hazanas de los Generalisimos acumuladas en la edificacion del Estado.
					
					Exhortaron a todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del ejercito popular y los trabajadores a hacer brillar eternamente la vida revolucionaria y las hazanas de los Generalisimos y a luchar para la realizacion exitosa de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, uniendose compactamente en torno al Mariscal.

articles.title: Clausuradas competencias por grupos de futbol femenino de categoria A
articles.content:
Clausuradas competencias por grupos de futbol femenino de categoria A
						
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Terminaron las competencias por grupos del torneo de futbol femenino de categoria A que se desarrolla con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (9 de septiembre).
					En el capitalino Estadio Kim Il Sung tuvieron lugar el dia 4 los ultimos juegos Rimyongsu- Kalmaegi, del grupo C, y Pyongyang-Hwangryongsan de la zona D.
					
					El equipo Rimyongsu y el Pyongyang vencieron a sus rivales por 2 a 0 y por 5 a 1, respectivamente.
					
					Del dia 6 al 8, tendran lugar las semifinales entre los onces lideres de cada grupo.
